1152.content:
Ruby was definitely in a good mood, the Vytal Festival was underway and her team won their first round match. Though a bit upset that she wasn't going to fight in it anymore, due to the tournament structure (which didn't make sense to her), she decided to enjoy whatever else the festival brought. She was out by herself, looking at all the booths and people walking by, when she heard someone greeting her.

"Hey, what's up!?" Ruby looked around for a bit before noticing a familiar girl coming her way on a hoverboard. She recognized her as a member of Team ABRN, the team her's beat in the first round. The girl brought her hoverboard to a stop, stepping onto the ground and holding her board under her arm.

"Oh, hello," Ruby gives a friendly, but nervous, greeting, "You're that hoodie girl from Team ABRN, aren't you?"

"Yep, name's Reese," she confirms, "And you're Ruby from Team RWBY, you're easy to remember." Reese says with a chuckle

"Yeah, I guess it is." Ruby gives a small smile as she blushes, "Sooo...You don't have any hard feelings about being out of the tournament because of my team, do you?"

"Don't worry about it," Reese says with a grin, "You win some, you lose some, can't do anything about it now."

This seemed to give Ruby some relief, knowing how hard and how much all students wanted to win, she was afraid some might hold a grudge for beating them.

"So, I've been hearing that you are like a giant weapon nut, is that true?" Reese asks, making Ruby blush a bit

"W-Well, maybe, I-I mean I do appreciate and admire all the hard work people put into making their weapons and using them. I enjoy the sharpness of a blade, the booms of a gun, the explosions, and the super cool way they change from one thing to the next!" Ruby squees a bit, before realizing Reese is looking at her with an amused smirk, making Ruby chuckle in embarrassment.

"It's cool, so what do you think of mine?" Reese holds up her board

"Well...I think it's the most awesome thing I've ever seen! A hoverboard that can change into two guns!? I never seen a weapon that someone can ride on before."

"Sweet, hey, how about I give you a special demonstration on what it can do?" Reese offers

"Really!?" Ruby's now full on giddy, "Just for me?"

"Think of it as my way of congratulating you on your victory."

"Well, heck yeah! That sounds awesome!" Ruby excitingly accepts

"Alright! See you then! This is gonna be so cool!" Ruby runs off in excitement to prepare. As she runs off, the smile Reese had changed into an scheming smirk.
